name.baseName: Sediment restoration ; in-situ capping ; activated carbon ;Production of capping materials
底泥修复;原位覆盖;生物炭;材料生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The production process of activated carbon materials used for Sediment capping.
用于底泥覆盖填埋的活性炭材料的生产环节。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: There is no clear start time for data collection in the literature, and the start time of the validity period is based on the publication time of the literature
文献中没有明确数据收集的开始时间，以文献发表时间为有效期的开始时间

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: After investigation, no relevant domestic research literature has been found yet.
经查询，暂未找到国内有相关研究文献

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The acticed carbon is anthracite coal based production (1kg) cosuming semi-anth coal 1.89 kg, electricity 0.3774kwh and the transport is 0.905 tkm.
所用生物炭来自中国的无烟煤化石产品,生产1 kg活性炭，消耗煤1.89 kg，电力0.3774 kwh,运输距离0.905 tkm。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The activated carbon produced by this process is intended for in-situ capping in sediment restoration projects. It is designed to efficiently cap contaminated sediments and is commonly used in environmental engineering applications to prevent the spread of pollutants. This product is suitable for large scale implementation in the field due to its capability to be spread over contaminated sediment sites.
该过程生产的活性炭用于沉积物修复项目中的原位覆盖。它设计用来有效地封顶被污染的沉积物，并且通常用于环境工程应用，以防止污染物的扩散。由于该产品能够被广泛地散布在被污染的沉积物场地上，它适用于大规模现场实施。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The life cycle inventories, i.e. the aggregated environmental data collected for the modeled system, are derived from three sources. The main source used for the majority of processes is the Ecoinvent 2.2 database.
Process inventory data是根据ISO 14040关于LCA.35的规定获得的。基本数据来自特定场地的盆栽实验、中试和供应商处获取，这些数据代表了中国南方的情况。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，从中选择了地理来源和技术因素最相似的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sparrevik et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2011, 45, 10, 4235–4241
Sparrevik et al. Use of Life Cycle Assessments To Evaluate the Environmental Footprint of Contaminated Sediment Remediation. Environ. Sci. Technol. 2011, 45, 10, 4235–4241

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset, the following methodological considerations should be noted: the dataset does not include recycling of the material; thus, if the activated carbon will be recycled, relevant data adjustments may be necessary. The use phase behavior is not modeled within this dataset; hence, users should include it based on their specific application scenarios. The dataset's validity begins from the publication date of the literature due to the lack of a specific start time for data collection. Since the primary data reflects conditions in Southern China, geographical and technological representativeness for other regions should be considered when extrapolating. Secondary data is sourced from Ecoinvent database v2.3, where processes with the most similar geographic origin and technological factors were selected. The user should consider updating the dataset with more recent databases or localized inventory data when available.

使用此数据集时，应注意以下方法论的考虑因素：数据集不包括材料的回收利用；因此，如果将对活性炭进行回收，可能需要进行相关数据调整。使用阶段行为在此数据集中没有模型化；因此，用户应根据他们的具体应用场景来包括它。由于缺乏数据收集的具体开始时间，数据集的有效性从文献发表日期开始。因为主要数据反映的是中国南方的条件，当推广到其他地区时，应考虑地理和技术的代表性。二级数据来自Ecoinvent数据库v2.3，选用了地理来源和技术因子最相似的过程。用户应当考虑在有可用的情况下，用更新的数据库或地方化的清单数据更新数据集。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
